Title: Pigs Have Wings
Writer: Marco Lombardo Radice (novel), Lidia Ravera (novel), Paolo Pietrangeli (screenplay)
Actors: Cristiana Mancinelli, Franco Bianchi, Lou Castel, Anna Nogara
Plot: Rocco and Antonia, two 15-year-old students in the same Roman high school, meet at an event and fall in love.
